      • setSpecialSequences

        public void setSpecialSequences(DSequence consensus,
                       DSequence refSeq)
        Description copied from interface: DSequenceAlignment
        Insert in the MSA a consensus sequence as well as a reference sequence. Both sequences should be added at the top of the MSA, the reference being before the consensus.
        Specified by:
        setSpecialSequences in interface DSequenceAlignment
